price: Ya ce: "Wannan wata rahama ce daga Ubangijĩna. Sai idan wa'adin* Ubangijĩna ya zo, ya mayar da shi niƙaƙƙe. Kuma wa'adin Ubangijĩna ya kasance tabbatacce."
arabic: قَالَ هَٰذَا رَحۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّيۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّي جَعَلَهُۥ دَكَّآءَۖ وَكَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّي حَقّٗا
footnotes: * Wa'adin Ubangiji da fitõwar Yãjũj da Mãjũj. A yanzu bãbu wanda ya san inda suke zaune, sai Allah.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
